histogram.name: Accessibility.{ServiceName}.Service.CrashCountBeforeResume
histogram.summary: Records the number of {ServiceName} service crashes before one successful shutdown. It is recorded when the service shuts down due to being idle, and had crashed before and restarted.

histogram.name: Accessibility.{ServiceName}.Service.Initialization
histogram.summary: Records if launching the {ServiceName} service was successful or not.

histogram.name: Accessibility.{ServiceName}.Service.InitializationTime.{Result}
histogram.summary: Records how long it took for the {ServiceName} service to {Result}.

variant.name: Failure
variant.summary: fail initialization

variant.name: Success
variant.summary: initialize successfully

histogram.name: Accessibility.{ServiceName}.Service.IsSuspended
histogram.summary: Records if {ServiceName} service was suspended due to crash. Recorded when a client asks for service availablity or for connection to the service.

histogram.name: Accessibility.{ServiceName}.Service.LifeTime
histogram.summary: Records the duration of {ServiceName} service. The metric is stored after the process shuts down or crashes.

histogram.name: Accessibility.{ServiceName}.Service.MaxMemoryLoad
histogram.summary: Records the maximum memory usage of {ServiceName} service. The metric is stored after the process shuts down or crashes and up to 1GB and only if the process runs for more than one second.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.AdaBoostModel.NegativeScore
histogram.summary: Records the score for the ada boost model for negative scores (scores that prevent pages from showing). This model is used to determine if any given page is suitable for distillation. Recorded for every page load.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.AdaBoostModel.PositiveScore
histogram.summary: Records the score for the ada boost model for positive scores. This model is used to determine if any given page is suitable for distillation. Recorded for every page load.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.Android.AnyPageSignalWithinTimeout
histogram.summary: For all distillation page signals, records if the distillation result made it within the magic toolbar button timeout. Recorded when ReaderModeActionProvider gets a distillation result.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.Android.DistillablePageSignalWithinTimeout
histogram.summary: For distillable pages, records if the distillation result made it within the magic toolbar button timeout. Recorded when ReaderModeActionProvider gets a distillation result.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.Android.OnDistillableResult.AccessibilitySettingEnabled
histogram.summary: Records whether the reader mode accessibility setting is enabled. Recorded when ReaderModeManager gets a distillation result.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.Android.OnDistillableResult.PageDistillationResult
histogram.summary: Records the end-state of the distillation result. This is different from the triggering model result because it also includes android business logic. Recorded when ReaderModeManager gets a distillation result.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.Android.ReaderModeEnabledInAccessibilitySettings
histogram.summary: Tracks when the user interacts with the reader mode toggle in accessibility settings.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.IsDistillable
histogram.summary: Records the end result when determining if given page is distillable. Recorded for every page load.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.LongModel.NegativeScore
histogram.summary: Records the score for the ada boost model for negative scores (scores that prevent pages from showing). This model is used to determine if any given page is suitable for distillation. Recorded for every page load.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.LongModel.PositiveScore
histogram.summary: Records the score for the ada boost model for positive scores. This model is used to determine if any given page is suitable for distillation. Recorded for every page load.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.ReaderMode.EntryPoint
histogram.summary: The method a user used to enter reader mode on an article.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.ReaderMode.ExitPoint
histogram.summary: The method a user used to exit reader mode and return to the original article.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.ReaderShownForPageLoad
histogram.summary: Records if the panel became visible at any point after a page was navigated.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.Time.RunDistillationJavaScript
histogram.summary: The amount of time the distiller script spent running on the page. This is includes loading the script onto the web page. Recorded after the user has chosen to view a simplified version of the current page.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.Time.TimeToProvideResultToAccumulator
histogram.summary: Records the amount of time it takes for the reader mode signal to make it to SignalAccumulator. Recorded when the distillation result is passed to CPA. Only recorded on Android.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.Time.ViewingReaderModePage
histogram.summary: Records the amount of time a user spent on a Reader Mode Page. Recorded when the user exits reader mode. Only recorded on Android.

histogram.name: DomDistiller.WordCount
histogram.summary: Records the word count for the distilled page. Recorded when the page distillation result is received. Recorded per-page even if the article has multiple pages (e.g. a continue reading button).

histogram.name: PumpkinInstaller.InstallationSuccess
histogram.summary: Pumpkin installation is triggered when one of the features using Pumpkin (currently the only feature using Pumpkin is Dictation) are enabled. This histogram is recorded once when Pumpkin installation finishes with either success or failure. Warning: this histogram was expired 2023-11-30 to 2024-02-29, data might be missing.

histogram.name: SodaInstaller.BinaryInstallationResult
histogram.summary: Soda Installation is triggered when one of the features using SODA (e.g. Live Caption, Projector, Offline Dictation) are enabled. Records whether SODA binary installation succeeded. This is recorded once when SODA installation attempt finishes with either success or failure.

histogram.name: SodaInstaller.BinaryInstallation{Result}Time
histogram.summary: Soda Installation is triggered when one of the features using SODA (e.g. Live Caption, Projector, Offline Dictation) are enabled. Records the time taken for the binary installation to complete with {Result}, recorded at the end of the attempt.

histogram.name: SodaInstaller.Language.{SodaLanguageCode}.InstallationResult
histogram.summary: Soda Installation is triggered when one of the features using SODA (e.g. Live Caption, Projector, Offline Dictation) are enabled. Records whether SODA language pack installation succeeded or not. This is recorded once when SODA language pack installation attempt finishes with either success or failure.

histogram.name: SodaInstaller.Language.{SodaLanguageCode}.Installation{Result}Time
histogram.summary: Soda Installation is triggered when one of the features using SODA (e.g. Live Caption, Projector, Offline Dictation) are enabled. Records the time taken for the SODA language pack installation for {SodaLanguageCode} to complete with {Result}, recorded at the end of the attempt.

histogram.name: TextToSpeech.Event
histogram.summary: Events fired by the text-to-speech engine when speaking an utterance. Warning: this histogram was expired 2023-11-30 to 2024-02-29, data might be missing.

histogram.name: TextToSpeech.ExtensionNetworkSpeechSynthesis.Playback
histogram.summary: Counts when playback starts and stops on the audio element via the canplaythrough and ended events.

histogram.name: TextToSpeech.Settings.GetVoiceBytes
histogram.summary: When the user requests a download of a text-to-speech voice, records the success/failure result, and service used to download it. Warning: this histogram was expired 2023-11-30 to 2024-02-29, data might be missing.

histogram.name: TextToSpeech.Utterance.FromExtensionAPI
histogram.summary: Indicates if an utterance spoken via synthesized text-to-speech was triggered by the Chrome TTS extension API or the web speech API. Warning: this histogram was expired 2023-11-30 to 2024-02-29, data might be missing.

histogram.name: TextToSpeech.Utterance.HasVoiceName
histogram.summary: True if an utterance spoken via synthesized text-to-speech requested a specific voice by name. Warning: this histogram was expired 2023-11-30 to 2024-02-29, data might be missing.

histogram.name: TextToSpeech.Utterance.Native
histogram.summary: True if an utterance is spoken with native speech provided by the operating system, otherwise it's spoken via a Chrome extension that implements text-to-speech support. Warning: this histogram was expired 2023-11-30 to 2024-02-29, data might be missing.

histogram.name: TextToSpeech.Utterance.Rate
histogram.summary: The rate of an utterance to be spoken via synthesized text-to-speech. Warning: this histogram was expired 2023-11-30 to 2024-02-29, data might be missing.

histogram.name: TextToSpeech.Utterance.Source
histogram.summary: ChromeOS source that triggered text-to-speech utterance via extension API, from a few known accessibility clients (Select-to-speak, ChromeVox). Warning: this histogram was expired 2023-11-30 to 2024-02-29, data might be missing.

histogram.name: TextToSpeech.Utterance.TextLength
histogram.summary: The length of an utterance to be spoken via synthesized text-to-speech. Warning: this histogram was expired 2023-11-30 to 2024-02-29, data might be missing.
